item.description:
MUNAY-KI: ANCIENT SACRED RITES OF HEALING & INITIATION.

It’s time to come into your mastery!

Gifted byJudy Copp, a Munay-Ki Graduate 

5 Sunday evenings, April 8 – May, 6; 6:30-8:00 PM

Cost: Donations appreciated but not required for use of the space-

$10 - $15 per session recommended.

Video with Alberto Villodo, PHD will be shown at first meeting to explain the history of the Rites.

Please attend all sessions. This group will receive meditation for each of the Rites and enter sacred fire ceremony after receiving each one.

Once formed, the group will be a community, supporting one another toward spiritual mastery.

Coming from the high Andes in Peru, these ancient rites meaning "love" and "power" help us to step into our truth and the fullness of who we are. They have been gifted to us in the West to help us heal and come back into right relationship with ourselves, each other and the Earth. These rites of healing and initiation have been passed down for thousands of years from the Incan elders and from those that came before them. See www.Munay-Ki.org .

The Rites:

  1. Bands of Protection and Power - five energetic bands of protection to shield you from negative energy are installed in your energy field
  2. Healer's Rites - awakens the healing energy in your hands, opening you to a lineage of Earthkeepers from the past, connecting you to an ancient lineage of healers and teachers. Means you bless everyone you touch.
  3. Harmony Rites - you will receive seven archetypes into your chakras as seeds which will germinate with the power of fire
  4. Seers Rites - installs filaments of light from your visual cortex to your third eye and heart chakras. This helps you to perceive the world of energy.
  5. Daykeeper Rites - the Daykeepers were the healers, midwives and masters of the ancient stone altars. This rite connects you with the Divine Feminine and enables you to call on the power of these altars to heal and balance.
  6. Wisdomkeeper Rites - ancient wisdom resides in the mountains. The job of the Wisdomkeeper is to protect this lineage of wisdom. This rite connects you to the Divine Masculine
  7. Earthkeeper Rites - connects you to a lineage of archangels that are guardians of our galaxy.
  8. Starkeeper Rites - after receiving this rite, your body begins to evolve into homo-luminous. You acquire stewardship of the time to come and all future generations.
  9. Creator Rites - awakens the Divine-light within you. You acquire stewardship for all of creation, from the smallest grain of sand to the largest cluster of galaxies in the universe. The Creator rite was brought forth and gifted to us by Inka elders in the Andes during the summer of 2006.

To register, RSVP on this Meetup. Questions? contact Judy at 781-639-1236 or Judy@AHigherBalance.com.
item.name: Sacred Rites of the Munay-Ki - THIS MEETUP IS FULL
